title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5613.4 - Penalties for non-payment of taxes, fines, assessments and other fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5613.4 - Penalties for non-payment of taxes, fines, assessments and other fees

State Regulations

If a registrant fails to submit payment of: (a) State tax within 10 days after the
10
th
day of the month; or
(b) a fine or fee within 30 days of the date
such fine or fee is due pursuant to written notice from the Commission, the
commission shall charge interest as permitted by law and impose a fine of at
least $100 for each day that such payment is late. The commission may take such
other action against such registrant as the commission deems appropriate, including, without limitation, the suspension or revocation of a
registration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5613.4

Adopted

New

York State Register October 18, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
